responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "A4A401C949FDCACCFE6EB392375BC28F", "Magus Lanster can speak to the events of the blast, and moreover what remains of Muckbeard\'s Blade. You\'ll likely find her among the mages quarters fending off the undead. Our opponents have grown stronger and more numerous since the explosion, and we will have to address these further threats as soon as we can afford it.")
name: MADD_0010_CoC_WillardTugsby_86
